definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: So lets suppose you have a scientific theory in terms of atoms.
sentences.chinese: 假设你在原子论方面拥有一套科学理论。

sentences.english: Democritus’ atomic theory has other modern connotations.
sentences.chinese: 德谟克利特的原子论还具有另一个现代的隐含意义。

definition: deism, theological theory of God who does not interfere in the Universe
epistemology (in philosophy, the theory of how we know things)
René Descartes (1596-1650), French philosopher and author of Discours de la méthode 方法論|方法论
philosophy of idealism, the doctrine that external reality is a product of consciousness
voluntarism/metaphysical view, esp. due to Schopenhauer 叔本華|叔本华[Shu1 ben3 hua2], that the essence of the world is willpower
neo-Platonism (philosophical system combining Platonism with mysticism)
pinyin: xin1 Bo2 la1 tu2 zhu3 yi4
